user_query: I'm a music enthusiast planning a road trip with my friends. Could you fetch the playlist info for the Soundcloud playlist 'Almost Lover' using the Soundcloud API? Additionally, provide me with the latest release of an artist related to the song 'Shape of You' using the Shazam API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the playlist information for the Soundcloud playlist 'Almost Lover'.
Identify the artist related to the song 'Shape of You'.
Retrieve the latest release of the identified artist using the Shazam API.
